sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { UserContext } from '../Context/UserContext'; import { GlobalContext } from '../Context/GlobalContext'; const BACK_END_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL export default function SingleClient() { const { user } = useContext(UserContext) const { currentClient, setCurrentClient } = useContext(GlobalContext) const { client_id } = useParams() const [client, setClient] = useState({}) console.log(client_id) const getClient = async () => { const token = user.apitoken const res = await fetch(`${BACK_END_URL}/api/client/${client_id}`, { method: "GET", headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }, }) const data = await res.json() console.log(data) setCurrentClient(data.client) }; useEffect(() => { getClient() }, []) return (

{`${client.first_name} ${client.last_name}`}

Formulas Info Color Chart
) }
